PerfectNetExp.abs: 工作室将建筑学、设计和透视画法(scenography)的专业领域，并且将这些不同的学科相结合。常常受到邀请到各式各样的设计学校去 …
透视法(scenography) The notion of painting   写意与写实  a type of Chinese painting that relies on free strokes and shuns details “迹虽闲闲数笔.
scaena, scena(L.), stage 舞台scenography n. 透视图法schem

list.abs: each one of them will have its proper scenography with various themes from the past , the present and the future of the site : history , society , industry , Olympic spirit , and environment .每一个都有一个合适的明确的主题，现在和过去的区域，历史，社会，工业，奥林匹克精神和环境。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French scénographie, or via Latin from Greek skēnographia scene-painting, from skēnē (see scene)
